org.grails.plugin.vaadin.taglib
[Groovy] Class Converter

java.lang.Object
  org.grails.plugin.vaadin.taglib.Converter

class Converter

Collection of methods for converting a tag attribute to a required type, typically a Vaadin object.

This class is primarily a support class for Vaadin tag libraries.

Authors:
Francis McKenzie

toColumnGenerator

static Table.ColumnGenerator toColumnGenerator(def value)
Converts the value to a ColumnGenerator
Parameters:
value - If a closure, it must accept an Item as an argument. Otherwise, it must be a ColumnGenerator or else an exception will be thrown.

toComponentError

static ErrorMessage toComponentError(def value)
Converts the value to a ErrorMessage if not already.

toComponentListener

static Component.Listener toComponentListener(def value)
Converts the value to a Listener if not already.

toContainer

static Container toContainer(def value, def itemIds = null, def itemId = null, def itemEquals = null, def noSelection = null)
Converts the value to a Container.
Parameters:
value - If a collection, converted to a BeanContainer. Otherwise, the String representation is treated as a comma-separated list of values and converted to an IndexedContainer.
itemIds - List of itemIds to use for items in container, overriding both itemId param, and the default id
itemId - If is a closure, is called with bean as parameter to generate key. Otherwise, is treated as name of property of each bean that should be used as id.
itemEquals - The name of a property to use to inject an equals method into each item, using a proxy.
noSelection - Caption to use for item that will represent a null selection. This will always be added as first item in list.

toCurrencies

static List toCurrencies(def value)
Converts specified value to list of Currency objects

toCurrency

static Currency toCurrency(def value)
Converts specified value to Currency

toDateResolution

static int toDateResolution(def value)
Converts the value to a DateField Resolution

toFieldClass

static Class toFieldClass(def value)
Converts the value to a Field Class

Note that a list of aliases for Vaadin Component classes will be used for the conversion. E.g. a value of 'date' will translate to a DateField class.

toFieldDef

static FieldDef toFieldDef(Map props, Closure toConfigurer)
Converts the properties to a FieldDef

toFocusListener

toItemCaption

static String toItemCaption(Item item, def value, def itemCaptionMessagePrefix, def toMessage)
Generates a caption for a single item using the itemCaption and itemCaptionMessagePrefix params.
Parameters:
item - The item for which the caption will be generated
value - An item property name or closure that accepts the item (or wrapped bean) and returns the caption. If not specified, the item's toString() method is used to generate the caption
itemCaptionMessagePrefix - A value that will be prepended to the generated caption and the result is then used as an message code in a i18n lookup. If this returns null then the original generated caption is returned.
toMessage - Method for obtaining an i18n message
Returns:
The generated item caption

toItemIcon

static Resource toItemIcon(Item item, def value)
Generates an icon for a single item using the value, which may be a property id or a closure that accepts the item (or wrapped bean) and returns the icon name
Parameters:
item - The item for which the icon will be generated
value - An item property name or closure that accepts the item (or wrapped bean) and returns the icon name.
Returns:
The resource for the generated icon name
